description: A mysterious swordmaster from Fontaine, Skirk is known as the mentor of Tartaglia. She is a Hydro sword user who excels at swift attacks and versatile combat.
info: Skirk is a 5★ Hydro sword DPS/mentor from Fontaine, known for her swift swordplay and versatile combat. Build her for CRIT, ATK%, and Hydro DMG Bonus.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Abyssal Fencing
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 rapid sword strikes imbued with Hydro.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 rapid sword strikes imbued with Hydro.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to unleash two rapid sword strikes.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE Hydro DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Tidecaller's Lesson
skills.desc: Skirk unleashes a wave of Hydro energy, dealing AoE Hydro DMG and increasing her resistance to interruption.
skills.details_html:
Tidecaller's Lesson
Unleashes a wave of Hydro energy, dealing AoE Hydro DMG and increasing resistance to interruption. DMG scales with Skirk's ATK and Hydro DMG Bonus.

skills.name: Depth's Requiem
skills.desc: Skirk summons the power of the abyss, dealing massive AoE Hydro DMG and granting all allies increased Hydro DMG Bonus.
skills.details_html:
Depth's Requiem
Summons the power of the abyss, dealing massive AoE Hydro DMG and granting all allies increased Hydro DMG Bonus for a short duration.

passive_talents.name: Abyssal Insight
passive_talents.desc: After using Tidecaller's Lesson, Skirk's Hydro DMG is increased by 20% for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Mentor's Legacy
passive_talents.desc: Allies affected by Depth's Requiem gain 15% increased ATK for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Fontaine's Shadow
passive_talents.desc: When Skirk is in the party, sprinting stamina consumption is reduced by 20%.

constellations.name: Abyssal Agility
constellations.desc: After using Depth's Requiem, Skirk's Movement SPD is increased by 15% for 10s.

constellations.name: Swordmaster's Verdict
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Depth's Requiem by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Abyssal Supremacy
constellations.desc: Hydro reactions triggered by Skirk restore 3 Energy to her. Can occur once every 2s.

constellations.name: Tidecaller's Mastery
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Tidecaller's Lesson by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Mentor's Triumph
constellations.desc: Allies within Depth's Requiem's area gain 20% increased CRIT Rate.
